meanings.definition: The quality or state of being splendid.
meanings.sent1: The splendidnesses of the sunset filled the sky with beauty.
meanings.sent2: The splendidnesses of the royal palace left visitors in awe.
meanings.sent3: The splendidnesses of the cake made everyone smile at the party.
meanings.sent4: The splendidnesses of nature's colors painted a breathtaking scene.
meanings.sent5: The splendidnesses of the garden were a sight to behold.

meanings.definition: The splendor or magnificence of something.
meanings.sent1: We were amazed by the splendidnesses of the fireworks display.
meanings.sent2: The splendidnesses of the mountain view took our breath away.
meanings.sent3: The splendidnesses of the parade made the children cheer with joy.
meanings.sent4: The splendidnesses of the ballroom resembled a fairy tale setting.
meanings.sent5: The splendidnesses of the waterfall cascading down were mesmerizing.

meanings.definition: The impressive or grand appearance of something.
meanings.sent1: The splendidnesses of the grand cathedral were truly remarkable.
meanings.sent2: The splendidnesses of the historic building attracted many tourists.
meanings.sent3: The splendidnesses of the magician's trick left the audience in awe.
meanings.sent4: The splendidnesses of the luxury car turned heads on the street.
meanings.sent5: The splendidnesses of the starry night sky captivated all who gazed up.
